MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the KA26 postcode area of Girvan and Ballantrae. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 5:51pm. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of onsite delays and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by midnight. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 7:37pm on Saturday, 13 February 2021
